title: Tangent line approximation of a function

content.prompt: The function f is twice differentiable with f(2) = 1 ,f′(2) = 4 , and f″(2) = 3 . What is the value of the approximation of f(1.9) using the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 2 ?

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
